entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
